aboutMenu.contributors: This app wouldn't be the same without these awesome people
aboutMenu.title: About
aboutMenu.using: This app uses the following awesome tools and languages

botSettings.passwordHint: To Register a user/chat now you have to enter /start [yourPassword] to the bot via Telegram

setup.step1: Set up your own Telegram bot. This is fully secure and private, since you are the only one who can access the message archive. Enter @Botfather in the search tab of Telegram and choose the @Botfather bot.
setup.step2: Click “Start” to activate @BotFather bot or enter /newbot.
setup.step2-1: /setjoingroup disables that the bot is allowed to join a group.
setup.step2-2: /setprivacy disabels that the bot can read messages inside a group
setup.step3: Enter the Token inside the app settings
setup.step4: Write your bot over Telegram /start and follow the instructions.
setup.step4-1: Each user has to also send the Bot the /start command. You can share the Bot via Telegram over the profile or search for the like you searched for the BotFather bot.
setup.title: How to setup
